title: Wore gloves during sex for protection against corona

replies.msg:
Just wanted to tell a funny corona-related story.

So I met this guy on Grindr for sex. We started off intimate, kissed each other etc. He told me to undress so we could play with my ass. While I’m doing that he pulls out these latex gloves. I ask him why he wears gloves to which he replies it’s because of Corona. He looked hot wearing those so I joked it off and said it was hot, but this dude literally sucked my dick and we were tasting each other’s spit while kissing the second before. Now he thinks a glove will help him not catching Corona.
Gay post
